results.description: Kubernetes provides the option to use client certificates for user authentication. However as there is no way to revoke these certificates when a user leaves an organization or loses their credential, they are not suitable for this purpose
results.name: Client certificate authentication should not be used for users (Manual)

results.description: Kubernetes can audit the details of requests made to the API server. The --audit- policy-file flag must be set for this logging to be enabled.
results.name: Ensure that a minimal audit policy is created (Manual)

results.description: Ensure that the audit policy created for the cluster covers key security concerns
results.name: Ensure that the audit policy covers key security concerns (Manual)

results.description: Ensure that the kubelet service file has permissions of 600 or more restrictive.
results.name: Ensure that the kubelet service file permissions are set to 600 or more restrictive

results.description: Ensure that the kubelet service file ownership is set to root:root
results.name: Ensure that the kubelet service file ownership is set to root:root

results.description: If kube-proxy is running, and if it is using a file-based kubeconfig file, ensure that the proxy kubeconfig file has permissions of 600 or more restrictive
results.name: If proxy kubeconfig file exists ensure permissions are set to 600 or more restrictive

results.description: If kube-proxy is running, ensure that the file ownership of its kubeconfig file is set to root:root
results.name: If proxy kubeconfig file exists ensure ownership is set to root:root

results.description: Ensure that the kubelet.conf file has permissions of 600 or more restrictive
results.name: Ensure that the --kubeconfig kubelet.conf file permissions are set to 600 or more restrictive

results.description: Ensure that the kubelet.conf file ownership is set to root:root
results.name: Ensure that the --kubeconfig kubelet.conf file ownership is set to root:root

results.description: Ensure that the certificate authorities file has permissions of 600 or more restrictive
results.name: Ensure that the certificate authorities file permissions are set to 600 or more restrictive

results.description: Ensure that the certificate authorities file ownership is set to root:root
results.name: Ensure that the client certificate authorities file ownership is set to root:root

results.description: Ensure that if the kubelet refers to a configuration file with the --config argument, that file has permissions of 600 or more restrictive
results.name: If the kubelet config.yaml configuration file is being used validate permissions set to 600 or more restrictive

results.description: Ensure that if the kubelet refers to a configuration file with the --config argument, that file is owned by root:root
results.name: If the kubelet config.yaml configuration file is being used validate file ownership is set to root:root

results.description: Disable anonymous requests to the Kubelet server
results.name: Ensure that the --anonymous-auth argument is set to false

results.description: Do not allow all requests. Enable explicit authorization
results.name: Ensure that the --authorization-mode argument is not set to AlwaysAllow

results.description: Enable Kubelet authentication using certificates
results.name: Ensure that the --client-ca-file argument is set as appropriate

results.description: Disable the read-only port
results.name: Verify that the --read-only-port argument is set to 0

results.description: Do not disable timeouts on streaming connections
results.name: Ensure that the --streaming-connection-idle-timeout argument is not set to 0

results.description: Protect tuned kernel parameters from overriding kubelet default kernel parameter values
results.name: Ensure that the --protect-kernel-defaults argument is set to true

results.description: Allow Kubelet to manage iptables
results.name: Ensure that the --make-iptables-util-chains argument is set to true

results.description: Do not override node hostnames
results.name: Ensure that the --hostname-override argument is not set

results.description: Security relevant information should be captured. The --event-qps flag on the Kubelet can be used to limit the rate at which events are gathered
results.name: Ensure that the --event-qps argument is set to 0 or a level which ensures appropriate event capture

results.description: Setup TLS connection on the Kubelets
results.name: Ensure that the --tls-cert-file and --tls-private-key-file arguments are set as appropriate

results.description: Enable kubelet client certificate rotation
results.name: Ensure that the --rotate-certificates argument is not set to false

results.description: Enable kubelet server certificate rotation
results.name: Verify that the RotateKubeletServerCertificate argument is set to true

results.description: Ensure that the Kubelet is configured to only use strong cryptographic ciphers
results.name: Ensure that the Kubelet only makes use of Strong Cryptographic Ciphers

results.description: The RBAC role cluster-admin provides wide-ranging powers over the environment and should be used only where and when needed
results.name: Ensure that the cluster-admin role is only used where required

results.description: There are a variety of CNI plugins available for Kubernetes. If the CNI in use does not support Network Policies it may not be possible to effectively restrict traffic in the cluster
results.name: Ensure that the CNI in use supports Network Policies (Manual)

results.description: Use network policies to isolate traffic in your cluster network
results.name: Ensure that all Namespaces have Network Policies defined

results.description: Kubernetes supports mounting secrets as data volumes or as environment variables. Minimize the use of environment variable secrets
results.name: Prefer using secrets as files over secrets as environment variables (Manual)

results.description: Consider the use of an external secrets storage and management system, instead of using Kubernetes Secrets directly, if you have more complex secret management needs
results.name: Consider external secret storage (Manual)

results.description: Configure Image Provenance for your deployment
results.name: Configure Image Provenance using ImagePolicyWebhook admission controller (Manual)

results.description: Use namespaces to isolate your Kubernetes objects
results.name: Create administrative boundaries between resources using namespaces (Manual)
